titleStmt.title: Observations touching the principles of natural motions, and especially touching rarefaction & condensation together with a reply to certain remarks touching the gravitation of fluids / by the author of Difficiles nugae.
titleStmt.author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, for W. Shrowsbury ...,

notesStmt.note: The author of Difficiles nugae was Matthew Hale.
